item.title: Welcome to Websiteshot!
item.description: The idea for this already exists since the first time I had to take screenshots of a website. There are one-time screenshots, to have an ad-hoc snapshot, and screenshots that need to be taken over and over again. And there are those moments when I get annoyed why I don't have screenshots of older versions of certain products I've worked on. It's always nice to look back and see how a product has evolved.
